00032 # Added so py2exe properly packs xml.etree.ElementTree
00033 from xml.etree.ElementTree import parse, SubElement
00034 
00035 import sys, os
00036 import logging
00037 
00038 logging.basicConfig()
00039 
00040 if os.name == 'nt':
00041         sys.path.append('.')
00042 
00043 from distutils.sysconfig import get_python_lib
00044 terp_path = "/".join([get_python_lib(), 'Koo'])
00045 sys.path.append(terp_path)
00046 
00047 from Koo.Common import Localization
00048 Localization.initializeTranslations()
00049 
00050 from Koo.Common import Options
00051 
00052 
00053 from PyQt4.QtCore import *
00054 from PyQt4.QtGui import *
00055 
00056 from Koo.Common import Notifier, Common
00057 
00058 # Declare notifier handlers for the whole application
00059 Notifier.errorHandler = Common.error
00060 Notifier.warningHandler = Common.warning
00061 Notifier.concurrencyErrorHandler = Common.concurrencyError
00062 
00063 ### Main application loop
00064 app = QApplication( sys.argv )
00065 try:
00066         app.setStyleSheet( file(Options.options['stylesheet']).read() )
00067 except:
00068         pass
00069 
00070 Localization.initializeQtTranslations()
00071 
00072 from Koo.Dialogs.KooMainWindow import *
00073 from Koo.Dialogs.WindowService import *
00074 import Koo.Actions
00075 
00076 mainWindow = QMainWindow(None, Qt.CustomizeWindowHint)
00077 mainWindow.setLayout( QHBoxLayout( mainWindow ) )
00078 
00079 from Koo.Common import Api
00080 
00081 class KooApi(Api.KooApi):
00082         def execute(self, actionId, data={}, type=None, context={}):
00083                 Koo.Actions.execute( actionId, data, type, context )
00084 
00085         def executeReport(self, name, data={}, context={}):
00086                 return Koo.Actions.executeReport( name, data, context )
00087 
00088         def executeAction(self, action, data={}, context={}):
00089                 Koo.Actions.executeAction( action, data, context )
00090                 
00091         def executeKeyword(self, keyword, data={}, context={}):
00092                 return Koo.Actions.executeKeyword( keyword, data, context )
00093 
00094         def createWindow(self, view_ids, model, res_id=False, domain=None, 
00095                         view_type='form', window=None, context=None, mode=None, name=False, autoReload=False, 
00096                         target='current'):
00097                 WindowService.createWindow( view_ids, model, res_id, domain, 
00098                         view_type, window, context, mode, name, autoReload, target )
00099 
00100         def windowCreated(self, window, target):
00101                 mainWindow.setCentralWidget( window )
00102                 window.setParent( mainWindow )
00103                 window.show()
00104 
00105 Api.instance = KooApi()
00106 
00107 mainWindow.showFullScreen()
00108 
00109 import Pos
00110 app.installEventFilter( Pos.PosEventFilter(mainWindow) )
00111 
00112 # Load default wizard
00113 Rpc.session.login( 'PYROLOC://admin:admin@localhost:8071', 'test' )
00114 id = Rpc.session.execute('/object', 'execute', 'res.users', 'read', [Rpc.session.uid], ['menu_id','name'], Rpc.session.context)
00115 
00116 # Store the menuId so we ensure we don't open the menu twice when
00117 # calling openHomeTab()
00118 menuId = id[0]['menu_id'][0]
00119 
00120 Api.instance.execute(menuId)
00121 
00122 app.exec_()
